title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Feedback Strategies for Promoting Informal Learning in the Workplace

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can acquire at least three instances of unstructured knowledge for solving workplace problems using an organization's knowledge management system.
Through peer feedback and a real-time coaching system, learners can generate at least two work improvement ideas per week.
Learners document and submit at least 80% of feedback utilization cases and learning outcomes in a digital portfolio.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
